scriptella.configuration

Interface XmlConfigurable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationEl, ConnectionEl, ContentEl, DialectBasedContentEl, FallbackEl, IncludeEl, OnErrorEl, PropertiesEl, QueryEl, ScriptEl, ScriptingElement, XmlConfigurableBase

    public interface XmlConfigurable
    Implemented by classes which support configuration from XML.

    1.0
    Author:
    Fyodor Kupolov
